Posts.Content: vanwest wrote: Hello, This is the first time I have been a part of a discussion board. I signed up because I am worried. I am 55 years old and I have a pea sized lump in my left breast which I discovered three months ago. I went to my internist and she said "it's probably a cyst". As it did not go away I went to my daughter's obgyn. She felt it and said we need to see what this is. I went for a mammogram and an ultrasound this am and was told that both tests showed nothing. I felt good at first but now I don't know what I should do next. I'm really concerned because the lymphnode near my collarbone has been swelling off and on for about 4 months plus I have a rash that breaks out grows larger then goes away only to return in another area of my body. Forgive me for being long winded but I don't understand how we can feel a pea sized lump that doesn't show up on the tests. I've been told that my breast are very dense..this makes me even more concerned. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Worried about pea sized lump vanwest 2Hands4me

Posts.Content: Aug 31, 2009 12:46PM vanwest wrote: 2Hands4me..Thank you for responding! I'm sorry for everything you are going through. Please keep me posted and I will let you know what's going on with me.
Posts.Title: Worried about pea sized lump vanwest 2Hands4me

Posts.Content: Sep 2, 2009 07:00AM vanwest wrote: Dear Jen, Thank you so much for your advice....before I looked at the website this am  I said "please let someone share a story that will help me know which direction to take. When the lump didn't show up on the mammogram or the ultrasound I was so confused and thought maybe I am over reacting....but there is a little voice in my head that keeps saying "what if". My doctor is out of the office until Thursday. When I speak with her I will ask to be referred to a breast surgeon. Thank you for your  response....I will not wait on this...hopefully everything is fine but you are right, I need to determine what it is!
Posts.Title: Worried about pea sized lump vanwest 2Hands4me
